.container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-areas:
    'header header header'
    'sidebar content content'
    'footer footer footer';
  grid-template-columns: 200px 1fr 1fr;
  grid-template-rows: 80px auto 60px;
}

.header {
  grid-area: header;
}
.sidebar {
  grid-area: sidebar;
}
.content {
  grid-area: content;
}
.footer {
  grid-area: footer;
}
